blocks.data:
Calculate batch pricing for products for a specific channel, currency, and customer group.

**Limits**
* Limit of 50 concurrent requests.

channel_id.description: The channel context that pricing should be evaluated within. The default BC storefront is channel 1

currency_code.description: The currency of prices to be returned for this request

customer_group_id.description: The customer group relevant for any customer group pricing, tax values, etc.

items.description: The items to fetch prices for
Details/configuration for the product to request a price for.

product_id.description: The (required) product ID of the item

variant_id.description: The (optional) variant ID of the item

options.description: The (optional) option configuration of the product. May be "partially" configured for estimates.

option_id.description: The ID of the variant option or modifier option being configured for this product

value_id.description: The ID of the value matching the option being configured. Note: must be ID, not the value.

product_id.description: The product ID this price was generated for

value_id.description: The selected value ID for the configured option.

retail_price.description: The (optional) RRP/retail price configured for this product. Used for price comparison and storefront display purposes.

as_entered.description: The price provided by the merchant as entered in their catalog/price list (may be inc or ex)

entered_inclusive.description: Whether the `as_entered` price is inclusive or exclusive of tax, based on the stores tax jurisdiction
